pr_title: Fix inaccurate total hit count in _search/template api

timeline.message: Fix inaccurate total hit count in _search/template api

timeline.bodyText: This method has been called in RestSearchAction.parseSearchRequest above, so it's repeatly called here but useless.
timeline.author: gaobinlong

timeline.bodyText:
When rest_total_hits_as_int is set to true, trackTotalHitsUpToin the searchRequest is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE,
we should copy the value to the new searchRequest here  and check whether the track_total_hits in the inline script is set to a not accurate number.
timeline.author: gaobinlong

timeline.bodyText: Is this needed ? We throw a runtime exception so it should be ok to leave the IOException as is.
timeline.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Can you move this part and the checks below outside of the parser block ?
timeline.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Can you replace these tests with yaml tests. It's odd that the rest option is not used to test the behavior and we to prefer yaml tests when doing small integration tests like this.
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: Maybe also add one for the _msearch_template since your pr fixes both.
replies.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: Can we define a index with more than 10K documents easily in a yaml test file? I'm not sure about that. This method just tests index with more than 10K documents,because the default value of track_total_hits is 10000, so we can always get an accurate hits count with index having less than 10000 documents.
replies.author: gaobinlong

replies.bodyText:
I don't think you need to index 10k documents to test this change. The test I'd expect is that setting trackTotalHits to a value other than true/false in a template search request should fail the entire request when used in combination with rest_total_hits_as_int.
This should be easy to add in a yml test.
Regarding the test that should check that we track total hits by default if  rest_total_hits_as_int is set on search template request, I think a unit test of TransportSearchTemplateAction#convert would be enough. We shouldn't require to 10k docs for this.
replies.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a comment that a non-value of trackTotalHitsUpTo here indicates that rest_total_hits_as_int was used ?
timeline.author: jimczi

timeline.message: use yaml test instead of the test code
